description.oldValue:
1:1 VOIP and PSTN Call Recording and Transcription will now show in the Calls App, in the “call details” panel.  This feature permits users to view call recordings and transcriptions for both PSTN and VoIP calls.  Users have the option to delete call recordings, removing them from the call history in “call details” panel. If there are multiple recordings of a call, each call recording will appear in a list in call history, in the “call details” panel. 
GA date: December CY2021
description.newValue:
1:1 VOIP and PSTN Call Recording
and Transcription will now show in the Calls App, in the “call details” panel.
 This feature permits users to view call recordings and transcriptions for
both PSTN and VoIP calls.  Users have the option to delete call recordings,
removing them from the call history in “call details” panel. If there are
multiple recordings of a call, each call recording will appear in a list in
call history, in the “call details” panel.
